Description: 2023 Gut renovated 2-bed/2-bath unit in a two-family house on a quiet cul de sac with an outstanding Lower Allston location. It has new hardwood floors throughout, a modern kitchen with quartz countertops and brand-new stainless steel appliances, two renovated bathrooms with tiled walls and floors, and a large dining/living room. This apartment comes with in-unit washer/dryer. Plenty of on-street parking. Short distance to shopping, restaurants, Harvard Enterprise Research Campus, Harvard Stadium/Business School and BU. Quick access to Mass Pike and Storrow Drive.
